name: Metric
documentation: A compact metric representation of an {@link EventBatch}, used in {@link AppendEvents.Metric}.

fields.name: aggregateId
fields.documentation:
The identifier of the aggregate associated with this operation.

This field is commonly used to uniquely identify an entity in an event-sourced system, allowing operations such as event retrieval, appending, or deletion to be scoped to the specific aggregate.

fields.name: bytes
fields.documentation: The total number of bytes in the data across all messages within the batch.

fields.name: size
fields.documentation:
The size of the metric, representing the number of events or elements involved in a specific operation or in
 the aggregate.

fields.name: storeOnly
fields.documentation:
If {@code true}, the event batch only contained events stored in the event store, without publishing via
 the global event log for processing by downstream handlers. If {@code false}, the events were stored and
 logged in the global event log.
